title: Free mystery skin from riot:O

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: Logging in this morning i didn't expect a gift from riot but ty.

replies.body: I haven't gotten anything :( does that mean I won't be getting one?
No, they are handing them out in waves, it could take a whole week before you get yours.
I didn't get one because I'm abusive.
I got spirit guard udyr which is quite amazing.. i got proof thou if u wanna see it
I got Sultan Tryndamere. Well, I do play him a tiny bit, so whatever, that's alright.
... nice username im surprised it got through
